id.description: The unique identifier for the invoice line item.

invoice.description: The ID of the invoice associated with the line item.

invoice_id.description: The ID of the invoice associated with the line item.

subscription_item.description: The item details associated with the subscription.

properties.description: Additional information related to the invoice line item.

description.description: A brief description of the invoice line item.

discountable.description: Indicates whether the item is eligible for discounts.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item being billed.

amount.description: The total amount of the invoice line item, including any taxes and discounts.

type.description: The type of the invoice line item.

livemode.description: Indicates if the data is from a live mode.

proration.description: Indicates if the amount is prorated.

start.description: The start date of the period.

end.description: The end date of the period.

subscription.description: The ID of the subscription associated with the line item.

flat_amount.description: The flat amount for tiered pricing.

unit_amount.description: The unit amount for tiered pricing.

up_to.description: The upper limit for the tier.

aggregate_usage.description: The usage aggregation type for the plan.

created.description: The creation date of the plan.

statement_description.description: The statement description for the plan.

product.description: The product associated with the plan.

statement_descriptor.description: The statement descriptor for the plan.

interval_count.description: The number of intervals between plan billings.

transform_usage.description: Indicates if usage is transformed for the plan.

interval.description: The interval for the plan billing.

id.description: The unique identifier for the plan.

trial_period_days.description: The number of trial days for the plan.

usage_type.description: The usage type for the plan.

active.description: Indicates if the plan is active.

tiers_mode.description: The mode for applying tiered pricing.

billing_scheme.description: The billing scheme for the plan.

livemode.description: Indicates if the plan is in live mode.

currency.description: The currency of the plan amount.

properties.description: Additional metadata related to the plan.

updated.description: The last updated date of the plan.

invoice_item.description: The item details on the invoice.

currency.description: The currency in which the amount is denominated.

amount_excluding_tax.description: The amount of the invoice line item excluding any taxes.

unit_amount_excluding_tax.description: The unit amount of the item excluding tax.

invoice.description: The invoice related to the credited item.

items.description: Details of the credited items on the invoice.

price.description: The price per unit for the invoice line item.

amount.description: The amount of discount applied to the item.

items.description: Discount information for the invoice line item.

tax_rates.description: A list of tax rates applied to the invoice line item.

inclusive.description: Indicates if the tax is inclusive of the item price.
